name: Lila by Zivy
tagline: Turn every new tab into a 30-second energy reset
description: Your browser knows when you need a break. Lila offers breathing exercises, desk stretches, smart reminders, and focus timers during your workday. With Lila, work feels different: Stay sharp in meetings, beat the afternoon crash, and keep energy high.

name: Bookmarkjar ®
tagline: AI-powered bookmark manager for everything you save
description: Bookmarkjar is an AI-powered bookmark manager with semantic search, automatic tagging, and seamless cross-platform sync. Save anything and instantly find it again with AI-driven organization. It extracts key context and summaries from articles, tweets, videos, and more, so you spend less time digging and more time using what you save. Minimal, fast, and smart.

name: Side Space 2.0
tagline: #1 AI Assistant for Your Tabs
description: An AI-powered vertical tabs manager in your side panel. Research, summarize, and organize, chat with your tabs and let AI Assistant help you browse smarter.

name: SynthID by Google DeepMind
tagline: Detect AI-generated content with Google’s new watermark tool
description: Google is rolling out SynthID in the Gemini app, making it easy to verify whether an image was created or edited with Google AI. Just upload the picture and ask. Gemini checks for the watermark and gives a clear, quick response.

name: AI Browser
tagline: Automate anything online with a single prompt.
description: AI Browser let's you create AI browser agents that can log into accounts, click buttons and automate your work, all with just a simple prompt. It will analyze your prompt and generate a sequence of actions and then run it on a cloud based web browser.

name: Hargun's MacOS
tagline: A fully interactive, Mac-like experience directly in browser
description: Mac OS themed Web Portfolio built using Next.js, React, TypeScript and Tailwind

name: Textable
tagline: Lovable, but Teletext. A full channel from a single prompt.
description: Textable lets you create an entire Teletext channel from one prompt. Yes, those blocky, chaotic, “is my TV broken?” pages from the ancient world. Just type what you want (“make me a pirate news channel”, “give me cursed horoscopes”, “create a Teletext IKEA catalogue”) and boom. You can generate pages, stories, sport scores, puzzles, weird trivia, fake ads, whatever you want. Try it, break it, make absurd things. Teletext forever.

name: Onyx
tagline: Free, local-first 4K screen recorder
description: Stop paying to record your screen. Onyx is a privacy-first, studio-quality recorder that runs entirely in your browser. No servers, no uploads, and no "5-minute limits." Why I built it: Most tools force cloud subscriptions or downgrade quality. Onyx respects your privacy, giving you raw, high-bitrate 4K video instantly. Free forever. Built for creators to share work without friction.

name: Mouse Shaker
tagline: Simulate activity to stay online on messaging apps
description: Mouse Shaker is the most advanced jiggler when it comes to simulating almost perfect user activity. Mouse Shaker has capacity to even scroll pages and switch between tabs, no matter what applications you want it to navigate in.

name: npm.bet
tagline: Beautiful, interactive npm trends visualizer
description: npm.bet is a beautiful, interactive npm package download statistics visualizer built with Next.js 16, React 19, and Recharts. Visualize and compare your npm package downloads.

name: Auto Shutdown
tagline: Make Mommy proud, never miss bedtime.
description: A lightweight menu bar app that shuts down your Mac automatically at the time you choose.

name: Better Upload
tagline: Simple and easy file uploads for React, use your S3 bucket
description: The simple and bloat-free way to upload files in React. Upload directly to any S3-compatible service with minimal setup.

name: Apex Echo Ai
tagline: Answer engine optimization platform
description: Optimize your visibility in AI tools like ChatGPT, Grok, and Perplexity. Monitor mentions, optimize content, and test prompts to dominate AI-powered search results.

name: Noxs AI
tagline: Virtual Project Manager for Tech Teams
description: Noxs AI is an AI-powered tech project management assistant that automates progress control and prevents risks saving 30-50 h/sprint. Designed for tech managers, Noxs automates performance control, tracks delivery status in real time, helps manage technical debt, and transforms information from Slack, Jira, etc. into simple and actionable reports. Users interact with Noxs in the chat that your team is accustomed to, having a big context from tools Integrated (Jira, Confluence, Git, Slack, etc.)

name: AI-Researched Social Media Post Ideas
tagline: Fill the Content Gap between You and Your Audience
description: There’s a gap between what you post and what your audience actually seeks. We close that gap by deploying AI agents that scan the internet around the clock for the topics they are actively searching or discussing online and deliver fresh social media post ideas to your inbox each morning for FREE. Connect with your audience on a deeper level.

name: Extension Ranker
tagline: SEMrush, but designed for the Chrome Web Store
description: Extension Ranker is the first SEO platform built specifically for Chrome extensions. Unlike generic SEO tools, it uses real Chrome Web Store data to help developers find high-impact keywords, audit their listing with an Optimization Score, and track ranking changes across markets. A purpose-built workflow—Keyword Finder → Listing Audit → Rank Tracking—makes extension growth faster, clearer, and finally predictable.

name: SharedChat.ai
tagline: The easiest way to share AI chats beautifully.
description: SharedChat.ai lets you share AI conversations in a clean, readable, and permanent format. No screenshots. No formatting mess. Just instant, beautiful links you can post anywhere. Now in Public Beta. Automatically chooses the the best AI's to answer your questions with a built in smart router. Contains prompt builders to make your prompts stand out. API's used are Open AI, Gemini, Anthropic & Perplexity. Share a chat with whoever you want via email or make it a thread public.

name: trav
tagline: The new way to discover, plan, and travel.
description: Discover unique travel experiences, offbeat destinations, and authentic stays. From mountains to beaches, find your perfect getaway.

name: Gojiberry AI
tagline: Lovable for GTM teams
description: Gojiberry AI helps B2B teams find and contact leads already in buying mode. It tracks real-time intent signals like LinkedIn likes, comments, job changes, and funding rounds to spot ready-to-buy prospects. With one prompt, it builds your ideal lead list, enriches contacts, and generates personalized messages. Launch outreach in minutes, get 3–5x more replies, and replace cold prospecting with intent-driven automation.

name: Starterindex
tagline: Discover the best boilerplates and starter kits
description: Starterindex is the largest directory of paid and open-source boilerplates and starter kits, with 2,900+ listings and growing. Every boilerplate is categorized by technologies and relevant tags for easy filtering. Built for indie hackers, devs, founders, and agencies who ship fast and need a reliable starting point.
